title: National non-domestic rates collected by councils in England: forecast for 2020 to 2021
publisher: Ministry for Housing, Communities and Local Government
description: This release provides information on national non-domestic rates and associated information for the financial year 2020 to 2021.
datasetNotes: On the landing page,  this is the final spreadsheet titled 'National non-domestic rates 2020 -2021:  additional relief for 2020 - 2021'
